about_the_game:
This music pack includes:

= FamiSoulFrOST - authentic 8-bit NES versions of 6 original tracks made from scratch with FamiTracker, by Xeneder.

= SoulFrOST - original soundtrack of SoulFrost, consisting of:
- 6 in-game tracks
- 4 "Lost Tracks" which were made but were unused in-game
- 5 "Extra Mix" tracks which are resampled from the original ones. 4 of there are the Brip-07b variations actually.

Full tracklist:

1. Brip-00
2. Brip-01
3. Brip-02
4. Brip-04
5. Brip-07b
6. Brip-08

7. Brip-01 old
8. Brip-03
9. Brip-05
10. Brip-07

11. Brip-07b-Dirty
12. Brip-07c
13. Brip-07d
14. Brip-08b

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything reading MP3
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
